story.book.dataclient

Class DataClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • story.book.dataclient.DataClient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ESClient, IOClient

    public abstract class DataClient
extends java.lang.Object
    DataClient is an abstract class that represents a storage location that contains Stories. Stories can be serialized and deserialized using a DataClient.
    Author:
    Anthony Ou, Vina Nguyen
